page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area surveyed covers mainly mountain area.The only inhabited area is the village of{Bedlinog.} This is a small village,population just under 2000 but sixty years ago was a very busy coal mining village.The coal produced was taken to Dowlais Iron works.The population was much larger then but has decreased because of :_ 1> closure of local colleris 2> smaller families 3> families moving southward to Trelewis and Nelson because very little housing development has taken place since 1948.
